website_summaries.verdict: Solid hardware that opens and closes a garage door without a peep.
pros: A 2-in-1 product that comes with both the garage door opener as well as controls, this unit combines both function and ease of use

customer_reviews.title: Solid unit.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this door opener. I'd give it 5 stars except the wi-fi seems to work off and on even though I have a solid wi-fi signal. Not impressed with the MyQ app, but it works most of the time. Installation was easy, as a replacement for another unit. Spent most of a day getting it right, but the instructions were easy to understand and plenty of video to consult. I never had to use the telephone service offered. My last Chamberlain lasted 20 yrs. so hopefully this one will as well. It is quiet, and has all the features you would want. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising, But it Works - VERY SLOWLY!
customer_reviews.text: The garage door opener works "ok" - it reliably opens my garage door, it's not terribly loud, etc. However, the door opens VERY slowly. When I was researching why it ran slowly, it turns out that the motor is 1/2 horsepower (at best) - even though it is advertised as 1 and 1/4 HPS. There is a disclaimer in small print in the instruction manual stating that "HPS" does not mean "horse power." Very very annoying. The garage door opener is installed now. It works. I can live with it, but is is disappointingly slow . . . and I don't appreciate being tricked by false advertising. I'll never buy a Chamberlain again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price

I opted for the professional installation (which was fantastic - on time, efficient, courteous and even removed my old opener for me), which took about 25 minutes. This garage door opener is so quiet, I find myself double checking to make sure it is opening when I click on the remote. The display on the wall also records the temperature (nice feature) and the version I got has the wifi/smart phone option which is nice because I can receive notifications on my phone when the garage door is engaged.

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to wifi

I've even switched my router and modem to something way superior and still... problems. It is definitely the garage door opener that is having issues as I have alexa smart switches and Tp-link that connect to 2.4Ghz no problem (even further away from the garage door opener!!). I would not recommend this garage door opener. No wonder why it was so cheap.

product_meta.title: Chamberlain Group C870 Smartphone-Controlled Durable Chain Drive Garage Door Opener With Battery Backup And Max Lifting Power, Pewter
product_meta.description: The C870 is an extra strong chain drive garage door opener engineered with smart technology to help you manage activities and simplify your life. Built to withstand extreme conditions, it’s constructed with anti-vibration technology and precision engineered for years of reliability and smooth performance. Powered by Chamberlain’s Lift Power System, it delivers the maximum lifting capacity in the category. Built-in Wi-Fi and the MyQ App allow you to get real-time alerts, open, close, and know the status of your garage door—from anywhere. Designed and engineered for safety and security, the C870 includes a full-function wall control panel, a wireless keypad, and features enhanced Triband technology for superior range, performance, and less interference. The highest level of encryption and monitoring, paired with your home’s ISP and Wi-Fi router firewalls guard against hacking. Battery backup keeps the unit working even when the power is out. Accepts two 100-watt max non-halogen or 26-watt max CFL light bulbs (not included). Designed specifically for 7 ft. garage doors - extension kits required for 8 ft. and 10 ft. doors.
